forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming mostly clear later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Clear late. Low 27F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing late. Low 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...remaining cloudy with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 71F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 21C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 73F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 70F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
